data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Placing this package in the Tie::Hash namespace seems a clear
    choice. The most similar module is probably Tie::Scalar::Timeout ,
    and I considered using Timeout instead of Expire, but Expire seems
    better to me and those I discussed the module with universally refer
    to it as "expiration" so I went with that.
